title: Eupatoria/Magnopolis
description: Eupatoria/Magnopolis was a Hellenistic city of Pontus in Asia Minor founded initially by Mithridates VI Eupator in the valley of Phanaroea, near the confluence of the Lykos and Iris rivers. Cnaeus Pompeius re-founded the city as Magnopolis.

properties.description: Location is within the footprint of BAtlas map 87 grid B4, but otherwise undetermined
properties.title: Barrington Atlas location
